author: Benedikttk
body: As previously discussed at the CoreSoftware meeting at 30/Jul,2024: [indico link](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1442038/) . This PR aims to test python code quality checks in the CMSSW infrastructure and is not meant to be merged: testing of Python formatting workflow with cmsbot is being implemented.
title: [Do not merge] Testing Python formatting workflow with cmsbot
